captions.text: hold on friend
were you about to kill that spider?
spiders are important, just imagine what the world would look like
if all the spiders disappearing... firstly
there be a whole lot more insects.  1 individual spider eats approximately
2,000 insects a year
insects that would otherwise devour crops
and destroy our food supply, leading to our ultimate demise
more importantly we wouldn't have spiderman, It'd be like
caterpillar man or something... spiders are an
integral part of the ecosystem but that is not the end to their benefits
spiders are an invaluable food source for many animals
specifically various types of birds and lizards, not to mention all the animals that
eat
those birds and lizards, if we got rid of spiders we'd lose countless amazing species
some cultures even use spider silk
to create fishing nets by encouraging the spiders to spin webs
between two sticks of bamboo, maybe those fish don't like spiders but
whenever, everyone knows fish are liars anyway. research has shown that spider venom
could potentially be utilized to control and treat various diseases
without spiders we'd lose countless possible medicines
humanity as we know it
be overrun by Insects and
starvation
bugs would take over the world, it would be a literal
livinging nightmare

title: What If All The Spiders Disappeared?
